product_name: Hydro Flask Wide-Mouth Lid with Straw
long_description: Add the Hydro Flask Wide-Mouth lid with straw to your Hydro Flask water bottle (sold separately) for easy sipping when you're on the go. Fits the 18 fl. oz., 32 fl. oz., 40 fl. oz. and 64 fl. oz. wide-mouth Hydro Flask bottles. Includes two straws that can be cut to fit your wide-mouth Hydro Flask water bottle. Rubber coating on the mouthpiece won't show bite marks. Convenient finger loop can also be used to clip a carabiner so you can attach the bottle to your backpack. Hydro Flask Wide-Mouth lid with straw is top-rack dishwasher safe.
short_description: Add the Hydro Flask Wide-Mouth lid with straw to your Hydro Flask water bottle (sold separately) for easy sipping when you're on the go.
